name: ChemiSplice
description:
Welcome to our ChemiSplice! where you'll be tasked with manipulating and transforming various molecules to complete levels and unlock new challenges. Your goal is to use your knowledge of atomic structure, nuclear fission and chemical bonds to solve puzzles and reach new levels.

As an intern, you'll be working with a variety of molecules, ranging from simple compounds like Water and Beryllium oxide to more complex ones like acetylene. You'll use your knowledge of the interactions between atoms and the energy required to break or form chemical bonds to manipulate the molecules and complete each level.

ControlsActionsClick and dragMove atomsClick the arrowsShoot neutrons for nuclear fissionEOpen and close, Valencies ListEsc or BackspaceTo go backRRestart

Would love to hear some feedback :D
